definition: to respond to an emergency/to meet a contingency/(attributive) emergency
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
site area emergency (nuclear facility emergency classification)
general emergency (or "off-site emergency") (nuclear facility emergency classification)

sentences.english: We should be prepared for any contingency.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該對任何應急情況有所準備。

sentences.english: You should make clear the operation item and the time of start your engine in emergency case in your application.
sentences.chinese: 船方申請材料需說明作業項目和應急備車時間。

sentences.english: I'm sure you've seen what cats do when they see a strange dog.
sentences.chinese: 我相信你看過貓在敵逢陌生狗時的應急場面。

sentences.english: During the tenth five year plan, an earthquake emergency command system will be constructed in China.
sentences.chinese: 十五”期間，將建設中國地震應急指揮技術系統。

sentences.english: A worker is screened for radiation before entering the emergency operation center at the nuclear plant.
sentences.chinese: 進入應急指揮中心前，工作人員接受核輻射檢查。

sentences.english: We lost 90% of our emergency kit.
sentences.chinese: 我們損失了90%的應急裝備。

sentences.english: Nickel-cadmium batteries are used to provide emergency back-up power on planes and trains.
sentences.chinese: 鎳鎘電池也用作飛機和火車的應急後備電源。

sentences.english: You should set aside money for emergency use.
sentences.chinese: 你應當留出一筆錢以應急之用。
這架飛機正在應急放油。

sentences.english: Set up a local comprehensive HIV/AIDS occupational post-exposure emergency network.
sentences.chinese: 建立綜合性地方艾滋病職業暴露後應急處理網絡。

sentences.english: The township of Rio Rancho has hitherto not had its own emergency facilities.
sentences.chinese: “里奧蘭翹鎮”迄今還沒有自己的應急設施。

sentences.english: Customer emergency service mechanism is a significant measure to cope with power unforseen accidents.
sentences.chinese: 應急客戶服務機制是應對電力突發事故的重要措施。

sentences.english: This paper presents the Chinese framework of nuclear emergency management.
sentences.chinese: 論述了我國核應急管理的體系框架。

sentences.english: Science construction border defense emergency military action organization command structure.
sentences.chinese: 科學構建邊防應急軍事行動組織指揮體系。

sentences.english: It has the supplementary function in the process of earthquake emergency.
sentences.chinese: 它集成了地震應急工作的全過程輔助功能。

definition: to handle/to take care of/to punish
to meet a contingency/to adapt oneself to changes
to coordinate/to harmonize/to fit together/to match (colors etc)/harmonious/concerted
timely/apt to the occasion/in due course
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
